summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5792 for the improvement of 14th Avenue South, from Dallas Avenue to Director Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76377 as amended by Ordinances No. 76837 and 77168, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
